channel.title: Need help with attackPlayersWithin

item.title: Need help with attackPlayersWithin
item.dc:creator: @SWAT SWAT
item.description:
@SWAT wrote:

well my problem is that i am making autocast but if i do this
attackPlayersWithin(369, 30, 3);

the gfx will only show if you in the the range 3 steps of him and its mutli any knows a beter way for this

that you can attack him where he is on your map , and that it is non multi?

Read full topic
